task: Write and publish a book about Minzi the tomcat. Minzi lives in Saarbr√ºcken with the family Weber. The Weber family consists of the mother Stephanie, the father Julian, the daughter Frida (5 years old) and the son Fabian (2 years old).

subtasks.description: Write a short story about Minzi.
Make a plan for publishing a book with stories about Minzi.
